name: Zero Fantasy - Kanon
description:
◆Game type:
SRPG

Game features:
◆ Transfer
Some roles can be transferred to get a better career.

◆ restraint
The restraint of the attributes in the game is mainly from weapons, and choosing to restrain the enemy's weapons will put you in a more favorable position.

◆Role skills
Characters have powerful fixed skills, and using them will make it easier to knock down enemies!

◆Location task
At the stronghold, you will receive tasks from different forces. In addition to getting a lot of rewards, you can also capture rare enemies and convince them to your own camp!

◆Equipment synthesis
You will get more powerful equipment through the synthetic store of the stronghold!

◆Good feeling
Enhancing the heroine's goodwill will enhance each other's abilities and even unlock unique skills on the battlefield.

◆ difficulty selection
The game is divided into two modes: [normal] and [difficult]. In difficult mode, there will be unique enemies and events. If you want to understand the whole picture of the whole incident, it is only possible in the difficult mode.



Other related:
◆ This game is not difficult, novice players can easily carry out the plot.
◆ If you don't want to be tied to difficulty, you can also ask the author to download the archive provided by the author for better weapons and gaming experience!
◆This game is created using Srpg Studio.
